text: Taylor Swift is doing a lot to promote her new album, Reputation. Aside from the singles and music videos, the singer also released behind - the - scenes videos, branded UPS delivery trucks, and invited fans over for private listening parties. Next in the line - up is her special Reputation magazines, which Target will release on Friday, the same day as her album. Advertisement - Continue Reading Below Swift's been teasing her personalized publications on social media since she announced her upcoming record. They include handwritten lyrics, personal polaroids, and paintings by the singer. However, some fans noticed a few details in the magazines that have less to do with Swift's creative process. She shared the back covers of the publications today, revealing they're designed to look like celebrity tabloid magazine
